name: fileAppend
description: Appends the data contents to the file.

params.name: data
params.description: Data to append to the file

params.name: charset
params.description: The character encoding in which the file contents is encoded.

params.name: addNewLine
params.description: CF2016u11+ Indicates whether a new line is added to the end of the appended data

coldfusion.notes: Prior to CF2016u11 and CF2018u4, charset param was required.

examples.title: Simple Example
examples.description: Appends a mock entry to a file.
